column2: "Na ɔbɔfo a ɔnye me kasae no baa bio
column3: na obenyaan me dɛ nyimpa a woenyan no efi ne nda mu."

column4: Muhu kandzeadua a ne nyina yɛ sika
column6: na ne nkandzea esuon no wowɔ do; ndodobɛn esuon wɔ nkandzea a wɔwɔ n'etsifi no do nkorkor:"

column2: "Na mibisaa ɔbɔfo a ɔnye me kasae no
"Nna ɔbɔfo a ɔnye me kasae no buae see me dɛ
column3: Aso innyim iyinom n'adzeban? Na mesee dɛ
Iyi nye EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔbaa Zerubabel hɔ
woana nye wo? Ebɛdan asaase tɛtɛr wɔ Zerubabel enyim: na ɔdze etsifi bo no bopue aba abɔbɔ do ose dɛ

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'asɛm baa me nkyɛn bio dɛ
column4: "Zerubabel ne nsa na ɔatow fie yi fapem; na ne nsa na obowie so; na ɔwo ehu dɛ dɔm EWURADZE na ɔasoma me wo nkyɛn."

column2: "Na kaansa wobuu edwuma yi n'ahyɛse kakrabaa yi enyimtsia mpo a
column3: ber a wobohu promo no wɔ Zerubabel ne nsamu no
column4: hɔn enyi bɛgye na wobedzi ehurusi. Nkandzeadua esuon a ihunii no yɛ EWURADZE n'enyiwa; wokyin dzi akɔnaaba wɔ asaase do."
Ebɛnadze nye ngondua ebien yi a wosisi kandzeadua no n'enyimfa na n'abankum yi?"

column3: Ebɛn ngondua abaw ebien nye iyinom yi a wɔwɔ sika ano ebien a ohue sika ngo fa mu yi?"
Aso innyim iyinom hɔn adzeban? Na mesee dɛ
Iyinom nye nyimpa beenu a wɔasera hɔn ngo a wogyinagyina asaase nyina EWURADZE nkyɛn no."
